title: Yahoo Lifestyle
text: You hope to make a lasting difference in peoples lives today. You may want to create a legacy in honor of an individual you admire or something you cherish. Karmic Saturn moving direct in your 8th House of Renewal and Tribute drives you to contribute to a worthy cause or take action to remember someone special. Look at life as precious and recognize that what you do for others helps the world to be a more joyful place to exist. Transform your past hardships into building blocks to create a shelter for a better tomorrow. Get Your Complete Cosmic Profile
